channel.title: [Delta] Connection flooding question
channel.description:
I have a very clean + nice delta source running, however a DoS'er keeps nulling/crashing my server from connecting over and over, this isnt an SYI spammer, we have SYI fixed..
but the guy keeps connecting over and over by ping/dos etc..
Is there a tut/guide to add to my server to stop the future use of this?

item.title: [Delta] Connection flooding question
item.dc:creator: @JosephLazarus JosephLazarus
item.description:
@JosephLazarus wrote:

Yeah, the console says his ip is rejected, and he does it over and over with a different port each time and it eventually nulls…

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Connection flooding question
item.dc:creator: @reverce reverce
item.description:
@reverce wrote:

hmm, so they null ur server by flooding?

Read full topic
